text: Adrian Joseph Arias or shortly as Drei Arias, (born on September 20, 1996) is a Filipino model, indie actor and male pageant winner in Bulacan, Philippines. He is best known for his role at May for Ever (2024), Baka sakali (2023) and Don Filipo (2021).https://peoplaid.com/2021/05/29/drei-arias ==Career== He was hailed in Malolos, and attended with a course of Bachelor of Arts degree in Theater Arts of Bulacan State University in Malolos City. ==Filmography== ===Films=== * 2024 – May for Ever * 2023 – Baka Sakali * 2021 – Don Filipo ==Reference== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino people Category:Filipino actors Category:Filipino models
title: Drei Arias
